definitions.body: ploughshare—sg. sf. [[לִלְטוֹשׁ אִישׁ מַחֲרַשְׁתּוֹ]] v:1Sa 13:20 to sharpen each man his ploughshare 1Sa 13:20 (+ [[אֵתוֹ]], [[קַרְדֻּמּוֹ]]) + [[מַחֲרֵשָׁתוֹ]] v:1Sa 13:20, rd. prob. [[דָּרְבָּנוֹ]] his goad (so LXX SyrVer We Dr, see v:1Sa 13:21); pl. abs. [[מַחֲרֵשׁׂת]] v:1Sa 13:21 (+ similar list; on txt. of both vv. see Dr).
